description:
Netflix subscribers will be disappointed to know that one of the streaming service’s newest shows has been unexpectedly canceled. Despite high hopes and initial excitement, the series only lasted a single season on Netflix before the company revealed the disappointing news. Viewers who had grown invested in the characters and storylines are undoubtedly sad to [...]

The post Netflix Cancels Fan-Favorite Series After Just One Season appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Netflix Cancels Fan-Favorite Series After Just One Season
